# List cisst libraries needed
set (REQUIRED_CISST_LIBRARIES cisstCommon
                              cisstVector
                              cisstVectorFLTK
                              cisstOSAbstraction
                              cisstMultiTask)

# Set include/link directories
cisst_set_directories (${REQUIRED_CISST_LIBRARIES})

# CMake command, generate .cxx and .h from .fl files
fltk_wrap_ui (mtsExPeriodicTaskGuiFLTK displayUI.fl)

# create a library for the GUI component
add_library (mtsExPeriodicTaskGuiFLTK ${IS_SHARED}
             displayTask.cpp displayTask.h
             # files generated by fluid
             ${mtsExPeriodicTaskGuiFLTK_FLTK_UI_SRCS}
             )

# name the main executable and specify which source files to use
add_executable (mtsExPeriodicTaskFLTK
                main.cpp
                )

# link with example component library
target_link_libraries (mtsExPeriodicTaskFLTK mtsExPeriodicTaskGuiFLTK mtsExPeriodicTaskComponents)

# link with the cisst libraries
cisst_target_link_libraries (mtsExPeriodicTaskGuiFLTK ${REQUIRED_CISST_LIBRARIES})
cisst_target_link_libraries (mtsExPeriodicTaskFLTK ${REQUIRED_CISST_LIBRARIES})

add_custom_target (mtsExPeriodicTaskFLTK_Scripts ALL
                   COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy_if_different
                           ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/mtsExPeriodicTaskFLTK.cisst
                           ${EXECUTABLE_OUTPUT_PATH}/${CMAKE_CFG_INTDIR}
                   COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy_if_different
                           ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/mtsExPeriodicTaskNetworkFLTK.cisst
                           ${EXECUTABLE_OUTPUT_PATH}/${CMAKE_CFG_INTDIR}
                   SOURCES mtsExPeriodicTaskFLTK.cisst mtsExPeriodicTaskNetworkFLTK.cisst
                   COMMENT "Copying cisst scripts to the binary directory")
